stories.text: If a company is interested in aquiring your code, what is the process for letting them evaluate it without giving them access to the IP without stealing it?  What is to prevent them from not following through on the acquisition and using parts of your code?
stories.title: Showing Code to Acquiring Companies

stories.text:
SPIN selling is one of the most prominent sales methodologies. Vivipic made SPIN image templates for sellers so that you can use this concept for your Amazon product images easily. Don't waste time wondering what you should put on your images. Our storytelling templates guide you to present all the info customers need to make a buying decision.

Try it and see if it works!
